key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Normally we show a notification each time the user changes focus mode. It is a bit slow, so maybe you prefer not to enable it.

key.name: use-sloppy
key.description: When follow-mouse focus is set to "mouse", the focus is strictly on the windows under the mouse. In "sloppy" mode, the focus is on the last window that was under the mouse (default, recommended).
